title: Rahu Transit in the 8th House for Gemini Ascendant
summary: Rahu transiting the eighth house intensifies themes of secrecy, sudden change, and deep transformation. Interest in hidden matters, research, and taboo subjects rises. This phase can trigger unexpected financial shifts, inheritance issues, or psychological breakthroughs. While gains may come abruptly, instability follows secrecy. Transparency and inner work convert volatility into empowered transformation.

sections.heading: Career
points: Research, analytics, or investigative roles favored

sections.heading: Finance
points: Focus on joint finances and taxes

closing: This transit forces transformation through the unseen. Awareness and honesty turn chaos into power.
